researchAndThesis.title: Deep Reinforcement Learning for Intelligent Transportation Systems
points: Developed an intelligent traffic management system using Deep Reinforcement Learning (DRL) to mitigate urban traffic congestion by dynamically optimizing vehicle speed limits.
Implemented and benchmarked Deep Q-Network (DQN) and Deep Transformer Q-Network (DTQN) agents within the SUMO (Simulation of Urban Mobility) environment.
Demonstrated that the DTQN model consistently outperformed traditional algorithms and the baseline DQN by leveraging temporal data to make more adaptive and efficient routing decisions.
